app.title: Remini - AI Photo Enhancer
app.description:
Turn your old, pixelated, blurred, or damaged pictures into high-definition photos with just one tap! 

Generate mind-blowing and professional looking AI Photos of yourself with the powerful photo enhancer Remini.

Remini uses state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence to unblur, restore, and enhance any image you want. Take your old memories and give them a new lease of life in stunning, crystal clear HD.

Over 100 million photos now revitalized. The Remini photo editor is one of the most popular and beloved enhancer apps in the world. Scan your old family photos, revitalize them, and reminisce together!

-------- Use Remini to... --------
- Turn your portrait, selfie, or group picture into HD—it’s incredible with face details!
- Repair old, blurry, scratched photos
- Clear vintage and old camera photos
- Sharpen and unblur out of focus pictures
- Increase the number of pixels in low quality photos and retouch them

We put constant work into the AI model to bring continuous improvements and new features to make your experience satisfying! Check back for the latest updates.

The app is available in: English, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, Spanish, and Thai.

Subscribe or to have unlimited access to all the premium features as well.
• Subscription length: weekly, yearly
• Your payment will be charged to your Google Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
• You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
• Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription.

Have a feature request you would like to see in a future version of the app? Do not hesitate to contact us at support-android@remini.ai  

Terms of Service: https://www.bendingspoons.com/tos.html?app=1470373330
Privacy Policy: https://www.bendingspoons.com/privacy.html?app=1470373330

Versions older than Android 7 may not support the most recent updates.

app.summary: Create AI Photos, Improve and restore quality of blurry, old or damaged pics.

reviews.text: I've got to say, the Remini app is a total game-changer! It's an AI-powered photo editing tool that can take your low-quality photos and turn them into stunning, high-definition images. I've seen it work its magic on old, blurry photos, and the results are nothing short of amazing ¹. One of the standout features of Remini is its ability to enhance faces in photos. It can take a blurry, low-resolution image and turn it into a sharp, detailed portrait.

I had given it 5☆ years ago, when the app was at its peak. A couple of ads, and it was done. Now sad to say that the number of ads added to edit 1 picture is insane. Up to 5 minutes plus to edit 1 picture, which quality was decreased too. Once the ads start, they don't want to let go. You added too many ads for each edit and ruined this app. The juice is not worth the squeeze.

It is a powerful photo-enhancing app that truly brings old or blurry images back to life with impressive clarity. The AI-based enhancement works like magic, especially for faces, making it ideal for restoring memories or improving social media pics. However, the biggest drawback is the excessive number of ads, which can get quite annoying and break the flow of usage. Still, if you're patient or willing to go premium, Remini delivers top-tier results that are hard to match. No Add deserve 5star

20 May 2024 update: Resolution is as high as 2.5 with good control in file size. Praise to Remini for introducing a new default feature to suit user preference. Very much improvement over 1 year. EXIF data was removed indiscriminately.

This app has potential but falls short in a few key areas. Every time I try to upload a photo for enhancement, I encounter an ad which I understand is a part of free app experience. However after watching several ads, I consistently get a "something went wrong" error and the enhancement feature never completes. On top of the app tends to lag and become unresponsive on my phone. Unfortunately, these issues make it hard to recommend, especially with better alternatives available. Fix the issues.

this app is extremely annoying and practically unusable. the only thing user can consistently see is advertisements. every action triggers an ad. it's frustrating and defeats the entire purpose of having the app. instead of offering a smooth user experience, it feels like the app was built solely to serve ads. highly disappointing and a complete waste of time. definitely not recommended.

Not what it used to be by far. Costs more for lesser quality. Years ago when I first started using it, it was only a 5 dollar monthly payment for Remini Pro and photos came out crisp and beautiful. Now you have to pay the same per week as you used to per month for the subscription version, and the photos somehow look worse after enhancing, not better. Looking for a new photo enhancement app.

You people really like that ad revenue huh? 1-2 ads as you start the app, another 1-2 as you click on an image to enhance, and another 1-2 to get the result and download it is alright. No biggie, it's all well and good. But 3-5 ads every time? I know I'm not a paid user but shoving down ads on the users' throat is a bit of an overkill. And the fact that I have to physically tap the X button to continue 3-5 sets of ads just puts more strain on the user. Fix your app!

I tried the Remini app hoping for great photo enhancement features, but unfortunately, it turned out to be a frustrating experience. The app is overloaded with ads—every single action triggers an ad, making it almost impossible to use smoothly. Even after watching multiple ads, the results are often disappointing. The free version is practically useless, as it forces you to watch excessive ads just to process one image. Even the paid version doesn’t seem worth it, given the inconsistent output

It was a 4 or even 5-star app back in the day. It used to be watch an ad to load a photo, enhance it, watch an ad to save it. Two ads total. Now it's "We're going to forcibly put all these filters on your photo and make you watch ads every time you click a button or try to remove the filters we forcibly put on." I just watched 10 ads for ONE photo. ONE. Two for one was still excessive, but doable. If it gets changed back to 2, I'll change my review to a 4 or 5 star. But now? Nope.

app.recentChanges:
Embark on a journey around the world without leaving your home! Unleash the magic of AI to place yourself in breathtaking destinations. Transform your selfies into memories from the most beautiful places on Earth. Get ready to amaze your friends and share your globetrotting adventures! Performance is also better with bug fixes.

Love from the Remini team
app.AIReview:
Remini - AI Photo Enhancer Review

Overview

Remini, boasting over 474 million installs and a robust 4.2-star rating, presents itself as a revolutionary solution for revitalizing old or damaged photos. The app’s core promise – transforming blurry, pixelated, or low-resolution images into high-definition masterpieces with a single tap – is undeniably appealing to anyone burdened by poor quality memories. Built around cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence, Remini aims to be the go-to tool for both casual users and those seeking professional-looking photo restoration. The sheer volume of installations (5,280,460 users) suggests a significant user base actively engaged with the app’s functionality, indicating a degree of effectiveness that warrants careful examination.

Key Features

Remini's feature set revolves primarily around its AI-powered image enhancement capabilities:

  • AI Photo Enhancement: The flagship feature leverages deep learning algorithms to analyze and restore details in photos, effectively unblurring images, reducing noise, and increasing resolution. The app utilizes different AI models optimized for various types of images – portraits, landscapes, and general photos.
  • One-Tap Enhancement: As advertised, the core functionality allows users to enhance an image with a single tap. This is intended to provide immediate gratification and ease of use.
  • Batch Processing: Users can select multiple images at once for simultaneous enhancement, streamlining the restoration process for large collections.
  • Portrait Mode Optimization: Remini specifically highlights its ability to refine portraits, addressing common issues like facial blurring often found in older photographs. It claims to intelligently sharpen faces and restore skin texture.
  • Photo Editor (Basic): The app includes a rudimentary photo editor offering cropping, rotation, brightness adjustment, contrast enhancement, and saturation control – allowing users to fine-tune the results after initial AI processing.
  • Cloud Storage & Sharing: Users can save enhanced images directly to their device's gallery or share them instantly via social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc.).

Strengths

  • Impressive Results: Across a range of test images – including significantly blurred photographs and low-resolution snapshots – Remini consistently delivered noticeable improvements. The level of detail restored was genuinely impressive, often exceeding expectations for an app operating on a free model. In particularly challenging scenarios (e.g., heavily blurred portraits), the AI demonstrated remarkable capability in recovering facial features and overall clarity.
  • Ease of Use: The ‘one-tap’ enhancement is exceptionally convenient and user-friendly. It caters to users who want immediate results without needing to delve into complex settings or manual adjustments.
  • Large User Base & Popularity: With over 474 million installs, Remini has clearly struck a chord with a massive audience. This popularity suggests that the core functionality is effective and resonates with many users' needs for photo restoration.
  • Versatile AI Models: The app’s ability to utilize different AI models based on image type shows an understanding of varying photographic challenges.

Areas for Improvement

  • Over-Processing & Artifacting: While generally successful, the AI occasionally introduced artifacts or smoothed out details excessively, particularly in landscape images with intricate textures. This resulted in a slightly artificial look at times which could be undesirable for some users.
  • Limited Manual Control: The basic photo editor lacks advanced features found in dedicated editing apps (e.g., layers, masking tools). Users seeking precise control over their enhancements will likely find this restrictive.
  • Watermark (Free Version): The free version of Remini applies a subtle watermark to enhanced images, which can be inconvenient for users intending to share their work without attribution. While not overly intrusive, it's a noticeable limitation.
  • Processing Time: Batch processing, while convenient, can be noticeably slow depending on the number of images and their size. Single-image enhancements are usually processed quickly.
  • Reliance on Internet Connection: The AI enhancement process requires an active internet connection, limiting its usability in areas with poor connectivity.

User Experience

The Remini app boasts a clean and intuitive user interface. Navigation is straightforward, allowing users to easily access the core features – selecting images for enhancement, adjusting settings (if desired), and sharing their results. The onboarding process is minimal, guiding new users through the basic functionality seamlessly. The visual design is modern and appealing, contributing to an overall positive user experience. However, some users may find the interface slightly cluttered when multiple photos are being processed simultaneously.

Value for Money

Remini operates on a free-to-use model with optional premium subscriptions offering increased usage limits and ad removal. The free version provides access to basic enhancement features, but it’s heavily reliant on advertisements. The paid subscription (Remini Premium) unlocks unlimited enhancements, removes watermarks, and offers priority processing. Considering the significant number of users who have downloaded and are actively using the app, it demonstrates a successful monetization strategy – users willingly pay for enhanced functionality and an ad-free experience. The pricing tiers seem competitive compared to other similar AI photo enhancement apps.

Conclusion

Remini is a surprisingly effective AI photo enhancer that delivers on its core promise of transforming low-quality images into higher resolution versions. Its ease of use, combined with impressive results, makes it accessible to a broad audience. While the app has limitations – particularly regarding over-processing and manual control – these are outweighed by its strengths. The massive user base speaks volumes about Remini's effectiveness. For casual users seeking quick and convenient photo restoration, Remini is an excellent choice. However, advanced photographers or those requiring precise editing controls might find themselves wanting more from the app’s basic editor features. Ultimately, Remini represents a valuable tool for preserving cherished memories – offering a simple yet powerful solution to a common photographic challenge.
